trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBCTS672_04525_SEQ_00<tab>Meryld's ever-watchful gaze is upon you, with a smile uncomfortably reminiscent of Tataru writ across her face.
TEXT_SUBCTS672_04525_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the House Leveilleur maidservant.

TEXT_SUBCTS672_04525_MERYLD_000_001<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, it is a pleasant surprise to see you. As ever, your timing is impeccable.
TEXT_SUBCTS672_04525_MERYLD_000_002<tab>Lady Ameliance has entrusted me with a gift for you─a set of attire she hoped would be to your liking.

TEXT_SUBCTS672_04525_MERYLD_000_003<tab>Before relinquishing the clothing to you, I thought it prudent to make sure they are a proper fit. I am terribly sorry for the inconvenience, but may I trouble you to speak with the maidservant yonder?

TEXT_SUBCTS672_04525_MERYLD_000_004<tab>The gift is, of course, a token of Lady Ameliance's appreciation for your deeds─but I should hope you will accept it as a sign of thanks from we servants as well.
TEXT_SUBCTS672_04525_MERYLD_000_005<tab>And if I may say one more thing...please continue to look after Master Alphinaud and Lady Alisaie.
TEXT_SUBCTS672_04525_MERYLD_000_010<tab>Please seek out the maidservant for any necessary adjustments to the clothing when you have a moment.
TEXT_SUBCTS672_04525_HOUSEMAID04524_000_020<tab>Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. I have your attire here.
TEXT_SUBCTS672_04525_HOUSEMAID04524_000_021<tab>Lady Ameliance has a sharp eye for measurements, but please allow me to confirm no other adjustments are needed.
TEXT_SUBCTS672_04525_HOUSEMAID04524_000_022<tab>Hmmm...yes, the shoulders should fit nicely...and the length of the sleeves should not prove to be an issue either.
TEXT_SUBCTS672_04525_HOUSEMAID04524_000_024<tab>With that, I believe I have taken up quite enough of your time. On behalf of all the staff here at House Leveilleur, I wish you safe travels!
